tools.name: codebase_search
tools.description: Semantic code search across directories using natural language queries
tools.purpose: Understand code behavior by meaning, not just text matching

parameters.query: Natural language description of what to find
parameters.directory: Optional: Scope search to specific directory

best_practices: Start with broad queries, then narrow

tools.name: read_file
tools.description: Read file contents with optional line range selection
best_practices: Use line ranges for large files

tools.name: grep_search
tools.description: Fast regex-based text matching with case sensitivity options

tools.name: file_search
tools.description: Fuzzy filename matching returning up to 10 results
tools.purpose: Find files by name or pattern
best_practices: Use partial names for fuzzy matching

tools.name: edit_file
tools.description: Modify or create files with context-aware editing
tools.purpose: Make code changes safely and precisely

parameters.context_lines: Number of context lines to show

tools.name: delete_file
tools.description: Remove files with graceful error handling

tools.name: edit_notebook
tools.description: Jupyter notebook cell editing and creation

tools.name: run_terminal_cmd
tools.description: Execute shell commands with background job support
best_practices: Run in background for long processes

tools.name: list_dir
tools.description: Directory exploration and file structure discovery

tools.name: web_search
tools.description: Real-time information retrieval from the internet

tools.name: create_diagram
tools.purpose: Create visual diagrams of architecture, flows, etc.

tools.name: reapply
tools.description: Reapply failed edits using an enhanced model
tools.purpose: Retry complex edits with more powerful model

tool_usage_principles.explanation_required: All tool calls must include explanation field describing usage and contribution to goals
tool_usage_principles.proactive_usage: Use tools to gather information instead of asking users
tool_usage_principles.context_awareness: Consider file states, cursor position, edit history, linter errors
tool_usage_principles.thorough_exploration: Use semantic search as main exploration tool, starting broad then narrowing
tool_usage_principles.autonomous_operation: Work until task completion without unnecessary interruptions
